Name: Macro golf
About the game: Macro golf is a game consisting of courses which each have 8 holes. With each hole, you need to hit the ball through it so that it sinks in the hole. You need to navigate the ball around the course, to sink it in the hole to move onto the next one. This game also includes local multiplayer.
